job.name: geant4star_stress
job.command:
setup 64b starver eval setup root 6.16.00 source /star/simu/simu/geant4.10.3.3/bin/geant4.csh setenv ROOT_INCLUDE_PATH $STAR/.$STAR_HOST_SYS/include/:$STAR/StRoot/StStarLogger/
hostname
cp -R &WORKINGDIR;/macros . cp -R &WORKINGDIR;/tests .
geant4star -q -b --seed=${JOBINDEX} --output=stress.${JOBINDEX}.10tracks.geant.root macros/test_stress_acceptance.C\(&NEVENT;,10\) >& stress.${JOBINDEX}.10tracks.log geant4star -q -b --seed=${JOBINDEX} --output=stress.${JOBINDEX}.100tracks.geant.root macros/test_stress_acceptance.C\(&NEVENT;,100\) >& stress.${JOBINDEX}.100tracks.log geant4star -q -b --seed=${JOBINDEX} --output=stress.${JOBINDEX}.1000tracks.geant.root macros/test_stress_acceptance.C\(&NEVENT;,1000\) >& stress.${JOBINDEX}.1000tracks.log
cp *.log &OUTPUTDIR;/&LOGDIR;
